# Conteúdo

  1. Revisão de princípios de programação em R.
  2. Manipulação de dados com `tidyverse`.
  3. Recursos gráficos estáticos e interativos.
  4. Programação funcional.

# Materiais úteis

  1. Livros online:
     * [R for Data Science](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/).
     * [Advanced R](https://adv-r.hadley.nz/).
     * [Efficient R Programming](https://csgillespie.github.io/efficientR/).
     * [Hands-On Programming with R](https://d1b10bmlvqabco.cloudfront.net/attach/ighbo26t3ua52t/igp9099yy4v10/igz7vp4w5su9/OReilly_HandsOn_Programming_with_R_2014.pdf).
  2. Homepages:
     * [`tidyverse`](https://www.tidyverse.org/).
     * [`ggplot2`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/).
     * [`lattice`](http://lmdvr.r-forge.r-project.org/figures/figures.html).
     * [`latticeExtra`](http://latticeextra.r-forge.r-project.org/).
  3. Materiais de cursos:
     * [Introduction to the R tidyverse - Erik Barry Erhardt](https://statacumen.com/teach/ShortCourses/R_Programming/IntroTidyverse_ACASA_201802/Erhardt_RTidyverse_20180216.pdf).
     * [An Introduction to Tidyverse - Joey Stanley](http://joeystanley.com/downloads/171110-tidyverse_handout.pdf).
     * [A Two Hour Tour of the Tidyverse - Aimee Gott](https://www.londonr.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/presentations/LondonR_-_A_tour_of_the_Tidyverse_-_Aimee_Gott_-_20170515.pdf).
     * [Dplyr Introduction - Matthew Flickinger](https://genome.sph.umich.edu/w/images/8/8a/Dplyr_tidyverse_md.pdf).
     * [Getting Started in R: Tidyverse Edition - Saghir Bashir](http://ilustat.com/shared/Getting-Started-in-R.pdf).
     * [Introduction à R et au tidyverse - Julien Barnier](https://www.ecofog.gf/IMG/pdf/introduction_au_tidyverse.pdf).
     * [The tidyverse style guide - Hadley Wickham](https://style.tidyverse.org/_main.pdf).
     * [Une introduction à Tidyverse - Christophe Ambroise](http://www.math-evry.cnrs.fr/_media/members/cambroise/teaching/r4ds-slides.pdf).
  4. Folhas de referência (*cheatsheets*):
     * [R Reference Card](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/contrib/Short-refcard.pdf).
     * [Base R](http://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/base-r.pdf).
     * [Advanced R](https://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/advancedR.pdf).
     * [Data import](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-import.pdf).
     * [Data transformation](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-transformation.pdf).
     * [Data visualization](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/data-visualization-2.1.pdf).
     * [R Markdown](https://github.com/rstudio/cheatsheets/raw/master/rmarkdown-2.0.pdf).
     * [Data Wranglingwith dplyr and tidyr](https://www.rstudio.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/data-wrangling-cheatsheet.pdf).
     * [`data.table`](https://s3.amazonaws.com/assets.datacamp.com/blog_assets/datatable_Cheat_Sheet_R.pdf).
